item.title: About
item.description: Education 🎓 B.Sc. Systems Engineer Universidad Industrial de Santander 2021-2025 Skills & Interests 🖥️ Programming Languages & Technologies Python: PyTorch, OpenCV, Librosa, Pandas, Numpy JavaScript: React.js TypeScript: Angular, Chart.js Others: Bootstrap, Git, RESTful APIs, Agile Methodologies 🚀 Research Interests Thermal Imaging Medical Diagnosis Multimodal learning approaches 🏐 Hobbies I love playing volleyball I like personal finance and personal development Projects Breast Cancer Detection Using Thermal Imaging This project uses thermal imaging to non-invasively detect breast cancer.
